description.value:
A Rogue has many ways of getting out of harm’s way.  

  • At the end of each of your turns in combat as a non-action, you can attempt to Hide (should circumstances allow you to perform the Hide action) but at a disadvantage.  
  • You can spend a minor action to Dash while stealthed.  
  • You can use a reaction to Disengage if an enemy fails to hit you with a melee attack on their turn and immediately take a 5 foot step away from them.

system.requirements: Must have the Rogue Starter Abilities
